messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How many km to Golden Gate Bridge?
Could you let me know your starting point? For example, an address or latitude/longitude coordinates—then I can calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge in kilometers.
I actually don't have that info right now.

No problem. To compute the distance I still need some kind of starting point—even just the name of your city or a ZIP/postal code will do. If you’d rather give rough lat/lon, you can typically pull that from your phone’s Maps app. Let me know which you’d prefer, and I’ll take it from there!
Can you figure it out using the tools you have?

I don’t have a way to auto-detect your current location. To calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge I’ll need a starting point—this can be:

• An address (street/city/ZIP)  
• A city name or ZIP code  
• Latitude & longitude coordinates  

Once you provide one of those, I can compute the distance in kilometers.
Can you use your GPS settings or maps app?

I’m not able to pull your device’s GPS or map data automatically. If you can give me any of the following, I can then calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge for you:

 • An address (street/city/ZIP)  
 • A city name or ZIP/postal code  
 • Latitude & longitude coordinates  

Let me know which you prefer, and I’ll get you the distance in kilometers!
Can you figure it out using your tools?

I’m not able to auto-detect your location. To calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge, please share any of the following as your starting point:

• A street address (or city + ZIP/postal code)  
• A city name or ZIP/postal code  
• Latitude & longitude coordinates

Once you provide one of those, I can compute the distance in kilometers.
